  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping public RequestUserDTO registerUser(@ModelAttribute SignUpDTO signUpDto, @RequestPart("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image) throws IOException
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      signUpDto - The DTO containing the sign-up details of the user.
      image - The image file uploaded by the user.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the registered user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while processing the image file.

    • forgotPassword

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PostMapping("/{email}") public void forgotPassword(@PathVariable String email) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException
      Initiates the process of resetting the user's password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - If an error occurs while sending the password reset email.
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If the email subject encoding is not supported.

    • resetPassword

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @PutMapping("/{token}") public ResetPassDTO resetPassword(@PathVariable String token, @RequestBody ResetPassDTO resetPassDTO) throws TokenExpiredException, ValuesAreNotEqualException
      Resets the user's password.
      Parameters:
      token - The token associated with the password reset request.
      resetPassDTO - The DTO containing the new password and its confirmation.
      Returns:
      The DTO representing the updated password information.
      Throws:
      TokenExpiredException - If the token has expired.
      ValuesAreNotEqualException - If the new password and its confirmation do not match.
